Articles.Content:
Here's what I got in my hangar...

All KSP images have been moved here.

JR

Edited September 28, 2015 by Jolly_Roger

... and from the other angle

All KSP images have been moved here.

JR

Edited September 28, 2015 by Jolly_Roger

I wanted to get a sense of scale comparing all my ships together, and since the 7 here have over 2500 parts, getting them together in space would be pretty much impossible so I stuck them all in the hangar at once. It's pretty crowded already, I guess I'll have to post the other half of my fleet in part II.

JR
How many computers did you melt down when you were making those ships?

It's not that bad, I'm running on a laptop - I try to keep part counts low. The worst offender is the Dreadnaut at 700+.

JR

Edited August 20, 2014 by Jolly_Roger
Did you get your ideas from the star wars crafts?? They look very similar.... VERY similar... also, great work.
Yup. That's some awesome stuff right there.

Star Wars is definitely a huge influence, I started with the blockade runner from the first movie, and most of the other stuff is basically copied from games like Homeworld and Eve and Empire at War (with my own changes of course).

JR

And I'm not sure if I said this but it's all stock.

JR

they only go with hyperedit to orbit, correct?

still awesome!

It's not that bad, I'm running on a laptop

That..... That's insane.... O_o

they only go with hyperedit to orbit, correct?

still awesome!

No hyperedit, I don't use any mods or cheats of any kind for any of my designs - as a matter of fact the Dreadnaut and the Blockade Runner are SSTO's. They're all launched from the VAB, I just put them in the hangar to get a "Group Photo".

JR

Edited August 21, 2014 by Jolly_Roger

But don't get me wrong I love mods, I think they're great and I have used them before, I just prefer to work in the stock game when designing stuff like this so I can easily share it with anyone...

JR

interesting.

i dont use many mods too. mechjeb is the only one i use in carrer often. then i have some self made funmods for a new fun-carrer or sandbox

Ya MecJeb is pretty common, I've downloaded some craft files before and couldn't get them to work because there needed to be a specific mod (or version of a mod) that I didn't have loaded on my system. So I decided to just work with the stock game and try to make these ships as useful as possible. For the most part the ones pictured in this thread are warships - I just haven't armed them yet.

JR

Hi Jr

I'm glad to say I finally got time to check out the Sun Star and cyclops

Decided to weponise then, hope u dont mind. Also added more rokets for a greater speed to help attain orbit on sunstar.

Added my Roger rescue for size comapare and decided they needed a paint job

One of the mods I like more then mechjeb Kerb Paint.

Mad looking craft Jr. Now I just need to refuel and send them out

I think I'll see if i can get cyclops to laythe and sun star to duna.

I love the Sun star as it reminds me so much of Homeworld 2 and the Pride of Higara

Edited August 22, 2014 by KandoKris

I LOVE IT!!!!!!!

That is awesome DUDE! That's exactly what I designed this stuff for - great paint job

JR

Yeah all my ships are WIP - I went on a design binge for about 2 weeks and decided I was going to design a new ship every day. All I wanted to do was make it cool, useful, and able to get into orbit without edits. After I took a look at the collection I stood back and though I gotta share these with other people, so I signed up on the forum. What I want to see is guys taking these ships and adding weapons and shields and stuff and having space battles. I have some ideas... well lets just say this is just the beginning.

All KSP images have been moved here.

JR

Edited September 28, 2015 by Jolly_Roger

I can be done Jr

U just need to setup a share "persistent.sfs" file

create player list / colors & battle rules

Like World War K!

JR

Or we could revive this thread...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37169-Spiritwolf-Hanland-Submissions

JR

Do u know how to pop ships directly into save files ? otherwise we need someonce that can as Chozo Nomad hasn't updated in a while

I Do now

I can do it

Edited September 2, 2014 by KandoKris
watching some of the vids looks like fun
He has a good idea, I'm not sure what happened.

I'm going to stir it up... After all I've got some pirating to do.

JR
